A doughnut or donut is a type of fried dough confectionery or dessert food.

To make doughnuts, start by mixing flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, eggs, milk, and butter together in a bowl. Then, roll out the dough and cut out the doughnuts using a doughnut cutter. Next, fry the doughnuts in oil for 1-2 minutes on each side.
